Become a seven women donor

Your donations support us to expand our work in Nepal, which in turn empower marginalised women to take control of their own lives. 

To donate click here

Our programs fall into three categories:

Education:
Literacy and Numeracy, gender awareness, Women's rights, Health  

Skills Training:
Knitting, sewing, felting 

Income generation: 
savings and loans, opening bank accounts, basic business training, micro finance programs.  

We THANK-YOU for your support. 
Your donations will be used on one of the below items. 
 

Your contribution goes a long way.

For $25

Pays for a women's resources to start her off in literacy class.

For $60

Pays for a women to learn new skills for three months.

For $100

Pays for a women to participate in hospitality training which leads to emppoyment pathways.

To donate click here

Get in touch

Seven Women Supporters

Seven Women

Seven Women has socially and economically empowered over 5000 women in Nepal through literacy, skills training and income-generation programs. 

Feel free to send us an email at steph.w@seven-women.com
